EP20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x5582745501ee6a2aab02d22b22fa1173326c7bb6b183a95e7d7bc45669827527","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://50adb71a886c84db5b47a9240d07f392c81095d61b3a64b1f3a5d830ba97af31","dweb:/ipfs/Qmcb5XacVN1SUqYQ35vxqUZPweuybwNHa5rVnP4q4sPkrC"]},"src/libraries/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0xbb06dfe5983feadc7c27714a08047e890c4260a084748bff65327e6062478040","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6c56dd7db911e71a1e9138748a48c841d8798a37b38e14d3140b78fd82d79224","dweb:/ipfs/QmbH8Gsji5VoSA2AnAkwnzgEwhzrrJyjvpTBUAHaaAGfBR"]}},"version":1}

approve(address,uint256).details: Approves `spender` to transfer up to `amount` tokens from the caller's account.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to approve for transfer.
params.spender: The address which will transfer the tokens.

returns._0: True if the operation was successful.

burnFrom(address,uint256).details: Burns a specific amount of tokens from an account, reducing the total supply.

params.account: The account whose tokens will be burnt.
params.amount: The amount of tokens to burn.

returns._0: True if the burn was successful.

constructor.details: Deploys the CashBunny token and sets up the PancakeSwap pair.

params._authority: The address with authority to manage certain contract actions.

decimals().details: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. For example, if `decimals` equals `2`, a balance of `505` tokens should be displayed to a user as `5,05` (`505 / 10 ** 2`). Tokens usually opt for a value of 18, imitating the relationship between Ether and Wei. This is the value {BEP20} uses, unless this function is overridden; NOTE: This information is only used for _display_ purposes: it in no way affects any of the arithmetic of the contract, including {IBEP20-balanceOf} and {IBEP20-transfer}.

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Decreases the allowance of another address to spend tokens on behalf of the caller.

params.spender: The address which will spend the tokens.
params.subtractedValue: The amount by which the allowance will be decreased.

returns._0: True if the operation was successful.

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Increases the allowance of another address to spend tokens on behalf of the caller.

params.addedValue: The amount by which the allowance will be increased.
params.spender: The address which will spend the tokens.

returns._0: True if the operation was successful.

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

setExemptFeeAndDisableAtCap(address).custom:modifier: onlyFeeAuthority Can only be called by an address with the required authority.
setExemptFeeAndDisableAtCap(address).details: Allows the authorized caller to mark an address as exempt or not exempt from fees.

params._who: The address whose fee exemption status is being modified.

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Transfers `amount` tokens from the caller to `recipient`.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to transfer.

returns._0: True if the transfer was successful.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfers `amount` tokens from `sender` to `recipient` using the allowance mechanism.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to transfer.
params.recipient: Address to which tokens are transferred.
params.sender: Address from which tokens are transferred.

returns._0: True if the operation was successful.

setExemptFeeAndDisableAtCap(address).notice: Sets the fee exemption status for a specific address and renounce authority if cap is reached.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Transfer amount must be greater than zero"

arguments.value: Transfer amount must be greater than zero

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Transfer amount must be greater than zero"

documentation.text:
@dev Sets the distribution contract address.
 @param _distributionContract The new distribution contract address.
@dev Modifier to restrict access to the fee authority.
@dev Modifier to restrict access to the authority.

@title CashBunny
 @dev A BEP20 token with tax mechanism for fee distribution.
